articles.title: Massive Earthquake Strikes Russia, Alaska Faces Tsunami Threat
articles.summary: A powerful **magnitude 7.8** earthquake hit the **Petropavlovsk-Kamchatsky** region near **Russia's coast** on Thursday, according to the **U.S. Geological Survey**. The seismic event triggered immediate tsunami advisories for parts of **Alaska**, particularly the **Aleutian Islands**, raising concerns about potential coastal flooding.

articles.title: France Paralyzed by Strikes Against Macron's Public Service Cuts
articles.summary: **France** faced widespread protests and strikes on **September 18** as workers opposed President **Emmanuel Macron's** public service cuts. Demonstrators clashed with police in **Paris**, with teargas deployed during confrontations. Office worker **Nicolas Garriga** complained that protests regularly hold daily life hostage across the country.

articles.title: Indonesia and UAE Launch Massive Coding Education Initiative
articles.summary: **Indonesia** partnered with the **United Arab Emirates** to train **10 million** coders, announced Deputy Minister **Nezar Patria** and UAE Minister **Abdulla Nasser Lootah** in **Jakarta** on **September 15**. Indonesia currently has the **third-highest** number of software developers in the **Asia-Pacific** region.

articles.title: Nvidia Invests Five Billion Dollars in Struggling Intel
articles.summary: **Nvidia** announced Thursday it will invest **$5 billion** in **Intel**, becoming one of the chipmaker's largest shareholders with roughly **4%** ownership after new shares are issued. The investment comes weeks after the **White House** engineered a federal government stake in Intel amid turnaround efforts.

articles.title: Canada and Mexico Unite Against Trump Trade War Pressure
articles.summary: **Canada's** Prime Minister **Mark Carney** and **Mexican** President **Claudia Sheinbaum** agreed to deepen bilateral ties during a **Mexico City** meeting. Both nations vowed closer cooperation on trade and security while facing rising economic pressure from the **United States** under **Trump's** administration trade policies.

articles.title: Wegovy Pill Shows Promise Matching Injectable Weight Loss Results
articles.summary: A new trial reveals that **Wegovy** in pill form could deliver comparable weight loss to the injectable version, according to results published **September 18**. The oral medication breakthrough could significantly expand access to the popular **weight-loss treatment**, offering patients a more convenient alternative to weekly injections.

articles.title: US Blocks Gaza Ceasefire Resolution for Sixth Time
articles.summary: The **United States** vetoed a **UN Security Council** resolution demanding a **Gaza** ceasefire for the **sixth time** on **September 18**. **Algerian** ambassador **Amar Bendjama** apologized to Palestinian people after the devastating outcome, while **Morgan Ortagus**, US deputy special envoy, defended the American position.

articles.title: Deliveroo Founder Steps Down After DoorDash Takeover Deal
articles.summary: **Deliveroo** CEO **Will Shu** announced Thursday he will step down after **DoorDash** completes its **¬£2.9 billion** ($4 billion) acquisition of the British food delivery platform. Shu co-founded Deliveroo in **2013** with childhood friend **Greg Orlowski**, building it into a major European delivery service.

articles.title: Trump Rejects Taiwan Military Aid Package Despite Rising Tensions
articles.summary: President **Donald Trump** declined to approve a military aid package for **Taiwan**, according to reports from **September 19**. The decision comes amid rising tensions in the **Taiwan Strait** and marks a significant shift in **US** policy toward the self-governing island facing pressure from **China**.

articles.title: Liberia Declares National Emergency Over Devastating Drug Crisis
articles.summary: **Alternative National Congress** leader **Alexander Cummings** called **Liberia's** drug epidemic a massive emergency on Wednesday, urging stronger government action against narcotics trafficking. Speaking in **West Point**, one of **Monrovia's** most crowded communities, Cummings highlighted how disadvantaged youth are severely impacted by widespread substance abuse.

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Massive earthquake shakes Pacific Rim today.

historicalEvents.description: English defeat French at Battle of Poitiers
President James Garfield dies from assassination wounds
First underground nuclear test conducted by United States
